text: The Doctor and the Girl (also known as Bodies and Souls) is a 1949 American drama movie directed by Curtis Bernhardt and was based on the French novel Corps et Ã‚mes by Maxence Van der Meersch. It stars Glenn Ford, Janet Leigh, Gloria DeHaven, Bruce Bennett, Charles Coburn, Warner Anderson, Nancy Reagan and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * Category:1949 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Curtis Bernhardt
title: The Doctor and the Girl
